issue.title: [CF 257] Error upon logging - TMW unusable.
issue.body:
Here is the error:

Date: 2011-07-15 17:55:34
ID: 3
Error occured in: Global
Count: âˆž
Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\conditions.lua line 319:
   attempt to perform arithmetic on local 'start' (a nil value)
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   TellMeWhen\conditions.lua:319: CooldownDuration()
   [string "TellMeWhen_Group2_Icon1 Condition"]:1: CndtCheck()
   TellMeWhen\Types\cooldown.lua:137: OnUpdate()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1137:
      TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1105

1. I made a simple interrupt icon based on Pummel spell and two conditions: spell is usable and target is casting an interruptable spell.

2. After locking the addon I got this error and now I encounter it whenever I log in. Also can't edit it back. /tmw command does not work.

3. Using version 4.4.4

4. SV.lua attached, maybe you figure what is going wrong.


> Posted by CurseForge user oushies | Imported from CurseForge issue #257 | Raw
